## ZCurve.encode() method

Encodes given nD point as Z index.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encode(p: ArrayLike<number>): bigint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | point to encode |

<b>Returns:</b>

`bigint`
